Title: Burger Bliss
description: Experience Burger Bliss with our juicy and flavorful cheeseburger, a classic favorite.

Title: Spaghetti Veggie Delight
description: Delve into the Veggie Delight with our Spaghetti, a hearty blend of fresh vegetables and pasta.

Title: Fresh Garden Salad
description: Revitalize your senses with our Fresh Garden Salad, a healthy and refreshing choice.

Title: Fish Fillet
description: Indulge in our Fish Fillet, a culinary masterpiece. Delicately seasoned, perfectly seared – a seafood sensation in every bite.

Title: Beef Delight
description: Savor the richness of our Beef Delight, expertly prepared for an unforgettable dining experience.

Title: Chicken Kabab
description: Enjoy the succulence of our Chicken Kabab, a flavorful delight served with lavash.

Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
description: Treat yourself to our Crispy Chicken Wings, seasoned to perfection and served with your favorite dip.

Title: Pasta Perfection
description: Delight in the exquisite taste of our Pasta Perfection, a symphony of flavors in every forkful.

Title: Vegetarian Pizza
description: Satisfy your taste buds with our Vegetarian Pizza, loaded with fresh vegetables and melted cheese.

Title: Pasta Perfection

Title: Vanilla Milkshake
description: Indulge in the creamy goodness of a classic vanilla milkshake made with rich vanilla ice cream, cold milk, and a drizzle of vanilla syrup. It's a timeless treat that's perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings.

Title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: Enjoy the perfect blend of espresso, creamy milk, and caramel syrup over ice. This refreshing beverage is sure to perk you up any time of day.

Title: Chocolate Hazelnut Frappuccino
description: Treat yourself to a delightful combination of rich chocolate, creamy milk, and toasted hazelnuts blended with ice. It's a decadent and refreshing beverage that's perfect for chocolate lovers.

Title: Iced Matcha Latte
description: Savor the smooth and earthy flavors of matcha green tea combined with creamy milk and a hint of sweetness, served over ice. It's a refreshing and energizing drink that's perfect for any time of day.

Title: Caramel Mocha
description: Indulge in the rich flavors of chocolate and caramel combined with espresso and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream and a drizzle of caramel sauce. It's a luxurious treat for coffee lovers.

Title: Vegetarian Pizza
description: Satisfy your taste buds with our Vegetarian Pizza, loaded with fresh vegetables and melted cheese.

Title: Haddock Pizza
description: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette. Enjoy this savory pizza!

Title: Breton Fish Stew Pizza
description: Chargrilled chicken with avocado, baby gem lettuce, baby spinach, shallots, French beans, walnuts, croutons and a mustard dressing. A unique twist on a classic pizza!

Title: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil. Simple yet satisfying!

Title: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Satisfy your cravings with this timeless favorite featuring zesty tomato sauce, gooey mozzarella cheese, and savory slices of pepperoni on a crispy crust.

Title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Tender grilled chicken, tangy BBQ sauce, red onions, cilantro, and melted mozzarella cheese on a crispy pizza crust. A flavor-packed indulgence!

Title: Haddock
description: Chargrilled fresh tuna steak (served medium rare) on classic Niçoise salad with French beans.

Title: Haddock
description: Chargrilled fresh tuna steak (served medium rare) on classic Niçoise salad with French beans.

Title: Chicken and Walnut Salad
description: Pan roasted pork belly with gratin potato, braised Savoy cabbage, apples, thyme and calvados jus. This refreshing salad is perfect for a light meal.

Title: Fish Parmentier Salad
description: Sautéed breaded veal escalope with watercress, lemon and veal jus. This salad offers a delightful combination of flavors.

Title: Grilled Halibut
description: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette. A seafood lover's delight!

Title: Grilled Sardines
description: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette. These grilled sardines are bursting with flavor!

Title: Haddock Soup
description: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette. Warm up with this comforting soup!

Title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Indulge in the rich, molten center of this decadent chocolate cake. It's the perfect balance of gooey and cakey, sure to satisfy any chocolate lover's cravings.

Title: Tiramisu
description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, creamy mascarpone cheese, and dustings of cocoa powder make up this classic Italian dessert. It's a delightful combination of textures and flavors.

Title: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Enjoy the sweetness of fresh strawberries sandwiched between layers of fluffy shortcake and topped with whipped cream. It's a timeless dessert that's perfect for any occasion.

Title: Banoffee Pie
description: Savor the irresistible combination of bananas, toffee, and whipped cream atop a buttery biscuit crust. It's a heavenly dessert that's both comforting and indulgent.

Title: Lemon Meringue Tart
description: Tangy lemon curd nestled in a flaky pastry shell and crowned with fluffy meringue – this tart is a burst of citrusy goodness in every bite. It's a refreshing and elegant dessert option.
